answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.Sore burning scalp raises the suspicion of tension headaches, anxiety, neuralgias, and contact dermatitis, allergies to shampoos and conditioners and scalp infection.I would suggest you to take OTC pain killers and apply cold compresses on the affected part. If the symptoms do not subside please consult your PCP and undergo complete clinical evaluation.Take care!
